content: Bobes, You've got a little more editing to do. Military.com does not allow hotlinks. If it's showing up in blue lettering, it's hot and I don't mean Paris Hilton "hot". Take out the http and you should be fine for the second link, not sure about how you do it with the "5k by 25 May" one. If they show up on black lettering, you should be good to go. Don

title: Show Your Military Support.

content: Let me think for a moment. I have a daughter and two granddaughters who got up this morning and put on thier military uniform. Two of my brothers are retired military, a brother-in-law who is retired military, one niece is retired four nephew, two uncles, at least three first cousins, my wife all served in the military. Oh, ya I served for 23 years on active duty. I think I will support our troops - yesterday, today, tomorrow and forever. OAL God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: Thank you does not seem enough, does it? I am so proud of our men and women and their families that stand for freedom and justice for all. They are the best of the best and why America is the greatest place in the world to call home. I am very lucky to have them watch over me, I trust them, love them and know they will not stop until they get the job done. We are blessed to have such warriors stand for us and may God bless them, watch over them and keep them safe.
